title: Is there a name for associating songs with memories (i.e. every time you here a certain song you remember a memory that happened when you were listening to that song in the past)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Associate memories. I have loved pop music since my early childhood and the radio was playing everyday for my older siblings. I had no choice in what they listened to. I got used to it. I remember when songs from as far back as 1964 were popular and played regularly on the radio. One song for example was ‘Love Child’ by the Supremes. Since then I remember what year it was and what I was doing at the time I first heard it on the radio. Some songs really invoke some dear memories!
Association. A mental connection between concepts events or mental states that usually stems from specific experiences.
